global.error_page_removed: Sorry, that page does not exist

index.InsertNewunbanRequest_error_already_sent: Ban appeal has already been recieved. Please wait until a decision has been made.
index.CheaterReportRemove_declined_msg: Player report successfully deleted. The player was not banned, the reporter will be informed of our decision.
